pr_title: Project: LMS Integration - GSoC'21 Ayan Biswas
pr_body: ## Integration of CircuitVerse with LMS Platforms - Google Summer of Code 2021 #### See in [GSoC'21 Portal](https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/projects/#6282924346834944) #### See more details at [CircuitVerse GSOC 2021 Wiki](https://github.com/CircuitVerse/CircuitVerse/wiki/GSoC%2721-Project-List#project-4---lms-integration) ## Project Details Currently, CircuitVerse has a basic LMS within CircuitVerse to manage assignments. But with the increasing demand for full-fledged LMS features, it is required to be integrated with publicly available popular LMSs like Moodle/Canvas etc. However individual LMS integration per case to case basis is not possible, so in this project, [LTI (Learning Tools Interoperability)](https://www.imsglobal.org/activity/learning-tools-interoperability) is used to made CircuitVerse assignments available to the LMSs(like Moodle/Canvas/Sakai etc.). ## Features Added The goals are almost achieved. The following features are added to CircuitVerse: - [x] The CircuitVerse codebase made [LTI (Learning Tools Interoperability)](https://www.imsglobal.org/activity/learning-tools-interoperability) compatible. - [x] Necessary credentials can be generated for the LMSs to integrate with CircuitVerse.Updated the assignment creation UI to support the new credentials generation facility. - [x] The LMSs can now sync grades with the CircuitVerse platform. - [x] Some of the pages like (Groups/Assignments) are made iframe capable such that they can be accessed from the LMS side using [LTI]((https://www.imsglobal.org/activity/learning-tools-interoperability)) protocol. - [x] Added documentation for the teachers to connect the assignments with their LMS. ## Testing and Documentation * Rspec tests has been added to check the entire LTI integration flow.Please refer to the [spec/requests/lti_spec.rb](https://github.com/CircuitVerse/CircuitVerse/blob/9a0a1bd76cd39add7f256573af3e439114067863/spec/requests/lti_spec.rb) * The tutorial documentation for the teachers has been also added to the [CircuitVerseDocs](https://github.com/CircuitVerse/CircuitVerseDocs/pull/304), check CircuitVerse documentation [here](https://docs.circuitverse.org/) #### See the Phase 1 Blog: [LMS Integration: Phase 1 Report (GSoC 2021- Ayan Biswas)](https://blog.circuitverse.org/posts/ayan_phase_1_report/)

pr_title: Add assignments as LTI to LMS from CircuitVerse | GSoC'21 Ayan Biswas
pr_body: #### Describe the changes you have made in this PR - 1. CircuitVerse as an LTI can be added to Moodle , the key and secret is stored in the database in the ```group``` table - new fields added to the ```assignments``` they are ```lti_consumer_key``` and ```lti_shared_secret``` 2. Teacher can link new assignments to the LMS 3. Automatic login for the following cases - If the user is mentor (teacher) of the group 4. Restricting automatic login for the following cases - if the user is student ### Screenshots of the changes (If any) - #### For Teachers #### For Students #### Setup the LTI in LMS side
